intro: Euphrasia insignis var. togakusiensis, commonly known as the Togakushi eyebright, is a flowering plant native to Japan. It belongs to the Scrophulariaceae family and is characterized by its small, yellowish-orange flowers. The plant typically grows in rocky or mountainous regions, preferring well-drained soils. It has hairy leaves and produces numerous tiny flowers arranged in a spike-like cluster. This variety is valued for its medicinal properties and is often used in traditional herbal remedies.
